name: Fixed CLI options, added nix shell file to repo
Fixed cli options and lint/test order
Fixed rst linting error, added linter to tox
Inline images, escaping asterisks, language callback
Fix: remove space around list elements
Fix: Convert tags in table cells as inline
Added <sub> and <sup>, allow default link titles
Added support for new inline tags
body: Now supporting code, samp, kbd, pre, del, s

name: Fixed table parsing
body: Allowing for HTML Tags inside table cells and the omission of a table header row

name: Added Options for Newline and Strong Style
Upgrade to Python 3.x
body: This just adds the 3.x tags in PyPi and sets some dependencies straight. Only one test needed an update.

name: Better Blockquote handling
body:
This adds newlines after blockquotes to allow for following paragraphs

Thanks to all contributors!

name: Fixed extra whitespace added when block elements are separated by newlines
Add support for headings including elements
